title: My Pixel 4 is only 5 months old and Google locked my phone, tried all the ways suggested nothing
content:
Tried all the suggestions and nothing it just goes back to a capital G with a line moving under it! Went to AT&T they couldn’t do anything to unlock it, then went to a another cellphone company and they couldn’t get it unlocked. I was told you have a lock on it. 
Would loved to talk to someone about getting this phone fixed or replaced under my warranty!
